text:
@WhiteHouse @TrumpWarRoom @realDonaldTrump Yep, after two Americans went to China & brought #COVID19 back home, #Trump banned Chinese citizens, but still allowed Americans to go back-and-forth to China if they wanted? Is that a BAN? Read Section 2:
https://t.co/qc4pjm1Tey
